column3: In line with OECD guidelines, the Mercedes-Benz Group AG (former Daimler AG) has been submitting to Germany's Federal Central Tax Office a country-by-country (CbC) report as the Ultimate Parent Entity for the whole Group since financial year 2016. The CbC report is distributed to all participating tax authorities around the globe on the basis of bilateral and multilateral agreements. Also in line with OECD guidelines, the current EU Directive 2016/881 and German tax law, the Mercedes-Benz Group chooses to forego general pub- lication of its CbC reports, as the required transparency to the fiscal authorities, which are able to appreciate the content of the figures and data, has already been ensured.
